text: Tomara jene rakha, parthiba jibana krira-kautuka, saja-sajja, parasparika ahamika ebam dhana o janera pracurya byatita ara kichu naya, yemana eka brstira abastha, yara sabuja phasala krsakaderake camatkrta kare, erapara ta sukiye yaya, phale tumi take pitabarna dekhate pa'o, erapara ta kharakuta haye yaya. Ara parakale ache kathina sasti ebam allahara ksama o santusti. Parthiba jibana prataranara upakarana bai kichu naya.
